, his family, and his brilliant and dedicated team the very best for what I'm sure will be a long and successful future in Government. And here's the full statement from David Cameron : I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my Director of Communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the Government. During his time working for me, Andy Coulson has carried out his role with complete professionalism. He has been a brilliant member of my team and has thrown himself at the job with skill and dedication. He

Her version of the Idol staple impressed Randy Jackson , who responded simply with`` wow, wow, wow,'' while Paula Abdul declared unapologetically, I'm not a fan of the song. Simon Cowell was less PC, of course, saying Lindsey Cardinale 's version was`` the musical equivalent of Ryan Seacrest : you look the part, do everything right, and yet you're disappointed with the performance.'' The word is that the American executives behind the launch of Simon Cowell 's X Factor US are not convinced that Cole is well enough known among the show's potential core audience. It was thought the American job was a done deal but it seems the US executives have had a last-minute change of heart. They are now questioning whether she's famous enough in America.
